p: Voucher specimens were identified by Dr. Milica Rat and deposited at the Herbarium BUNS, the University of Novi Sad, Faculty of Sciences, Department of Biology and Ecology as S. kitaibelii Wierzb. ex Heuff. (2-1442), T. serpyllum L. (2-1444), O. vulgare L. ssp. vulgare (2-1450), A. millefolium L. sensu lato (2-1449) and A. clypeolata Sibth. & Sm (2-1448).
